@wp.kernel
def rand_expr_brmtnv(data: wp.array(dtype=float)):
    tid = wp.tid()
    v0 = data[tid]
    v1 = 0.0
    v2 = 1.0
    tmp = 0.0
    v0 = wp.exp(v1)
    tmp = (wp.exp((v2 + 0.04 - v0 + 0.13)) * 0.25)
    tmp = v1
    v1 = tmp
    v2 = wp.cos(wp.abs(0.84))
    v0 = 0.99
    data[tid] = v0
